description: Sent whenever a data export activity happens (e.g. export created/completed)
title: Export Webhook Schema

___status.description: The status of this export (e.g. is it running/finished?)
___status.title: Status

___stats.description: Statistics recorded upon completions of the export
___stats.title: Export Stats

___errors.description: The number of errors that occurred while running this export
___errors.title: Errors

___recordsProcessed.description: The number of records that were processed to complete this export
___recordsProcessed.title: Records Processed

___fileRef.description: A link to an uploaded file, if this export was based on an uploaded file (e.g. a list of redemption)
___fileRef.title: Uploaded File Reference

___outputFormat.description: The format this export will be generated in (e.g. CSV or Excel)
___outputFormat.title: Output Format

___params.description: These parameters are used to filter the export (e.g. by date or program)
___params.title: Export Filters

___dateExpires.description: The date this export expires (e.g. when it will no longer be downloadable)
___dateExpires.title: Date Expires

___operation.description: The operation being performed (for exports this is always QUERY)
___operation.title: Operation

___name.description: The name of this export (e.g. User Details)
___name.title: Export Name

___mailtoEmail.description: The email address that will receive a download link for this export when it completes
___mailtoEmail.title: Notification Email Address

___requester.description: The person or machine that requested this export
___requester.title: Requester

___dateCreated.description: The date this export was created
___dateCreated.title: Date Created

___id.description: The unique identifier for this export
___id.title: Export Id
